verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a door <S%G2374><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%>, a voice as <S%G5613><s%> of a trumpet <S%G4536><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, one saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come up <S%G305><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will show <S%G1166><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> the things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> come to pass <S%G1096><s%> hereafter <S%G3326><s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> Straightway <S%G2112><s%> I was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, there was a throne <S%G2362><s%> set <S%G2749><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one sitting <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> to look upon <S%G3706><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a jasper <S%G2393><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a sardius <S%G4555><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, like <S%G3664><s%> an emerald <S%G4664><s%> to look upon <S%G3706><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> were four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the thrones <S%G2362><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%>, arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>; and2532, 2192 on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> lightnings <S%G796><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> there were seven <S%G2033><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, as it were a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a crystal <S%G2930><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> round about <S%G2945><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> full of <S%G1073><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a lion <S%G3023><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a calf <S%G3448><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a face <S%G4383><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of a man <S%G444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a flying <S%G4072><s%> eagle <S%G105><s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> each <S%G303><s%> one <S%G2596><s%> of them <S%G1438><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%>, are full <S%G1073><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> within <S%G2081><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Holy <S%G40><s%>, holy <S%G40><s%>, holy <S%G40><s%>, is the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>, who was <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who is to come <S%G2064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thanks <S%G2169><s%> to him <S%G3588><s%> that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, to him <S%G3588><s%> that liveth <S%G2198><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>,

the four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> shall fall down <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall worship <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> that liveth <S%G2198><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall cast <S%G906><s%> their <S%G846><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

Worthy <S%G514><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G2962><s%>, our Lord and our God <S%G2983><s%>, to receive the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> didst create <S%G2936><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were created <S%G2936><s%>.
